title: Mahou Sekai no Monogatari - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Elemental Magic   Familiars   Female Protagonist   Guilds   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Magic   Magic Beasts   Sword And Magic
author: Mako   まこ
description:
A world where magic exists.

This is the story of Nanalie Hel, a receptionist, and the magical world that surrounds her. The person she loves is her rival, her best friends are engrossed with love and work, her boss is evasive, her parents full of riddles and so on.>
